level.text: 8701.1 Subject to ยง 8701.2, a certification issued pursuant to thishapter shall
expire at 12:00 midnight of December 31 of each even-numbered year.
8701.2 The Director may change the renewal system pursuant to ยง006.3 of Chapter 40 of this title and modify the date on which a certificationhall expire.
Source: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 11937, 11938 (December7, 2010).
